languages.text: "Об Адепта Сороритас говорят, как о самых неудержимых в вере воинах Империума. Так ли это?"
"They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors of the Imperium. Is it true?"
languages.original_text: "Об Адепта Сороритас говорят, как о самых неудержимых в вере воинах Империума. Так ли это?"

traits.locale_text: "They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors the Imperium. Is this true?"
"They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors the Imperium. Is this true?"
"They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors of the Imperium. Is it true?"
"They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors of the Imperium. Is it true?"
"They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors of the Imperium. Is it true?"

languages.text: “人们都说，修女会的修女是整个帝国之中最虔诚的战士。这是真的吗？”
languages.original_text: "They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors of the Imperium. Is it true?"

traits.locale_text: “人们都说，修女会的修女是整个帝国之中最虔诚的战士。这是真的吗？”

languages.text: «Dicen que las Adepta Sororitas son las guerreras con la fe más intensa del Imperium. ¿Es cierto eso?».
languages.original_text: "They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors of the Imperium. Is it true?"

traits.locale_text: «Dicen que las Adepta Sororitas son las guerreras con la fe más intensa del Imperium. ¿Es cierto eso?».

languages.text: 「修道聖女会は、帝国の戦士の中でも最も激しい信仰を持っていると言われているが、本当か？」
languages.original_text: "They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors of the Imperium. Is it true?"

traits.locale_text: 「修道聖女会は、帝国の戦士の中でも最も激しい信仰を持っていると言われているが、本当か？」

languages.text: "Es heißt, dass die Adepta Sororitas von allen Kriegern des Imperiums die mit dem stärksten Glauben sind. Ist das wahr?"
languages.original_text: "They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors of the Imperium. Is it true?"

traits.locale_text: "Es heißt, dass die Adepta Sororitas von allen Kriegern des Imperiums die mit dem stärksten Glauben sind. Ist das wahr?"

languages.text: « On dit que la foi des membres de l'Adepta Sororitas est sans égale parmi les guerriers de l'Imperium. Est-ce la vérité ? »
languages.original_text: "They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors of the Imperium. Is it true?"

traits.locale_text: « On dit que la foi des membres de l'Adepta Sororitas est sans égale parmi les guerriers de l'Imperium. Est-ce la vérité ? »

languages.text: "Denilenlere göre Adepta Sororitas, İmparatorluk'ta inancın en çetin müdafileriymiş. Doğru mu bu?"
languages.original_text: "They say the Adepta Sororitas are the fiercest in their faith among the warriors of the Imperium. Is it true?"

traits.locale_text: "Söylenene göre Adepta Sororitas, İmparatorluk'ta inancın en çetin müdafileriymiş. Doğru mu bu?"
